ClearPending.description: This action is used to clear all the pending values.
ClearPending.longDescription: This action shall perform a clear pending values.

DellManagerLinks.description: This is the complex property is for the additional OEM Links realted to the DMTF Manager Schema.
DellManagerLinks.longDescription: This is the complex property is for the additional OEM Links realted to the DMTF Manager Schema.

enumDescriptions.BMC: The Baseboard Management Controller (BMC) owns and manages the front/rear USB ports.
enumDescriptions.Host: The host system owns and manages the front/rear USB ports.

ResetToDefaults.description: This action is used to reset the Dell attributes to default.
ResetToDefaults.longDescription: This action shall perform reset of the Dell attributes to their default values.

SetCustomDefaults.description: This action is used to set the custom defaults to be used during Reset.
SetCustomDefaults.longDescription: This action is used to set the custom defaults to be used during Reset.

title: #DellManager
